scripts.clean-cdk: cd infra && rm -rf cdk.out cdk.context.json; cd ..
scripts.deploy: yarn add-assets && cd infra && cdk deploy;cd ..
scripts.deploy-local: yarn add-assets && cd infra && STAGE=sandbox cdk deploy --profile $PROFILE
scripts.deploy-pipeline: yarn add-assets && yarn clean-cdk && cd infra && cdk deploy --profile $PROFILE --all;cd..
scripts.deploy-sandbox: yarn add-assets && STAGE=sandbox yarn --cwd infra cdk deploy --profile restaurant
scripts.deploy-sandbox-seb: yarn add-assets && STAGE=sandbox yarn --cwd infra cdk deploy --profile sebastian171000-sandbox
scripts.deploy:custom: yarn add-assets && yarn clean-cdk && cd infra && cdk deploy $STACK
scripts.synth: yarn add-assets && cd infra && cdk synth --validation;cd ..
scripts.synth-local: yarn add-assets && cd infra && STAGE=sandbox cdk synth --profile greenline-sandbox;cd ..
scripts.build-layer: yarn --cwd app install && yarn --cwd app build;
scripts.copy-assets: rm -rf infra/assets; mkdir -p infra/assets; cp -r app/layer.zip app/dist infra/assets; rm -rf app/layer.zip app/dist
